compliant.legal provisions: The requirement to inform users about changes to the privacy policy and how their personal information is processed.

compliant.section: Leofoo Tourism Group Intellectual Property Declaration (Copyright)
compliant.legal provisions: Protection of intellectual property rights and the requirement for consent before using copyrighted materials.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not specify a clear method for users to provide consent or opt-out after changes are made.
non_compliant.amend: Include a clear opt-in or opt-out mechanism for users to consent to changes in the privacy policy.

non_compliant.section: Leofoo Tourism Group Intellectual Property Declaration (Copyright)
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not provide clear information on how users can access or request their personal information related to intellectual property.
non_compliant.amend: Add a section detailing how users can request access to their personal information and the process for doing so.
